text: Abdullah Khodabandeh (28 August 1936 - 18 December 2019) was an Iranian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle bantamweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Iranian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Iran Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Abdullah Khodabandeh
